title: Torques - Direction of force for equilibrium

content.question: Which of the following could represent the direction of the force exerted by the pivot on the bar?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically upward.
The figure shows an arrow pointing upward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow pointing upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing downward and to the right.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing upward and to the right.
